displayTopicName: The letter ה at the start of a word

topicTokens.text: The letter ה at the start of a word

The letter ה at the start of a word.text: The letter ה at the start of a word could mean several things.

tokensOfLine.text: A ה at the start of a word might be part of the actual word, for example the ה in הֶֽבֶל which means vapor or emptiness.
A ה at the start of a word might be the

tokensOfLine.enclosingTopic: The letter ה at the start of a word
tokensOfLine.enclosingSubtopic: The letter ה at the start of a word

tokensOfLine.text: (like the word "the" in English), for example הַאֶבֶן, "the rock."
A ה at the start of a word might be a past tense Hebrew verb in the
